abilities.name: Crystal Type
abilities.text: Whenever you attach a Fire, Lightning, or Fighting basic Energy card from your hand to Charizard, Charizard's type (color) becomes the same as that type of energy until the end of the turn.

attacks.name: Fireblast
attacks.text: Discard an Energy card attached to Charizard.

attacks.name: Dragon Tail
attacks.text: Flip 2 coins. This attack does 50 damage times the number of heads.
